alert.note: Alert for Clark; Deuel; Hamlin (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued December 25 at 9:24AM MST until December 26 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of two tenths to three tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Clark, Hamlin and Deuel Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
